Subscription.Description: Windows Service Manager Errors. Targets: Vista+
Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="System"> <!-- Service Control Manager Failures and Crashes --> <Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Service Control Manager'] and (Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=7022 or EventID=7023 or EventID=7024 or EventID=7026 or EventID=7031 or EventID=7032 or EventID=7034)]]</Select>
<!-- Service Installed --> <Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Service Control Manager'] and Level=1 and EventID=7045]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
